plays.text: Goal scored by Andrei Kostitsyn (Wristshot 20 ft) assisted by Tomas Plekanec and Roman Hamrlik
Penalty to Derek Roy 2 minutes for Hooking Brian Gionta
Penalty to Adam Mair 2 minutes for Cross checking Roman Hamrlik
Bench penalty to Buffalo 2 minutes for Too Many Men on the Ice(served by Thomas Vanek)
Power Play Goal Scored by Andrei Kostitsyn (Snapshot 29 ft) assisted by Andrei Markov and Marc-Andre Bergeron
Penalty to Jason Pominville 2 minutes for Slashing Dominic Moore
Penalty to Carey Price 2 minutes for Delaying Game - Illegal play by Goaltender(served by Mike Cammalleri)
Penalty to Benoit Pouliot 2 minutes for High-sticking Craig Rivet
Penalty to Benoit Pouliot 2 minutes for High-sticking Craig Rivet
Penalty to Sergei Kostitsyn 2 minutes for Hooking Toni Lydman
Penalty to Ryan O'Byrne 2 minutes for High-sticking Tim Kennedy
Power Play Goal Scored by Tim Connolly (Slapshot 13 ft) assisted by Derek Roy and Tyler Myers
Goal scored by Paul Gaustad (Wristshot 8 ft) assisted by Steve Montador and Andrej Sekera
Penalty to Andrei Markov 2 minutes for Interference Jason Pominville
Shootout GOAL scored by Jason Pominville on Carey Price (Snapshot 23 ft)
Shootout attempt by Andrei Kostitsyn SAVED by Ryan Miller (Wristshot 18 ft)
Shootout attempt by Drew Stafford SAVED by Carey Price (Wristshot 17 ft)
Shootout attempt by Mike Cammalleri SAVED by Ryan Miller (Wristshot 11 ft)
Shootout GOAL scored by Thomas Vanek on Carey Price (Snapshot 23 ft)
